subject: Re: Proposed mock-ups for Duracube website amendments
preview: Hi Belinda, Great news, we have completed the updates that were provided in the Duracube Wire Frame PDF. These were completed on the staging website to allow the updates to be reviewed and then rolle

full_threads.body:
Hi Belinda, 

Great news, we have completed the updates that were provided in the Duracube Wire Frame PDF. These were completed on the staging website to allow the updates to be reviewed and then rolled out to the live website once approved. Links and a brief recap can be seen below. 

1. Main navigation: https://staging-duracube.kinsta.cloud/ - Here you will find the partially revised navigation/menu, specifically the introduction of 'Partitioning Systems' and the related products. 

2. Product page: https://staging-duracube.kinsta.cloud/products/ - Here you will find the updated layout for the product page. 

3. Partitioning Systems page: https://staging-duracube.kinsta.cloud/partitioning-systems/ - Here you will find the newly introduced page and layout. 

4. Product page: https://staging-duracube.kinsta.cloud/product/3000-series-toilet-and-shower-partitions-pedestal-mounted-overhead-braced/ - Here you will find the updated product page. 

Please review and let us know if there are any updates to be made. Once approved, we will apply the changes to the live site.
Logged a total of 2H to Harvest from Manuel, Jaime and Joel time spent for this task.
@chris do I need to record this to Harvest?

Hi @chris following updates are completed

Ask Help from Joel
  • Update single product page button styles
  • Add button “Download Data Sheet” on the single product page, it will display if it has a link - (Joel) - +20mins

Update Products & Partition System Page Images
  • Products
  • Url: https://staging-duracube.kinsta.cloud/products/
  • Partitioning system
  • Url: https://staging-duracube.kinsta.cloud/partitioning-systems/

Total Time: +1hr @ricaR

@jaime CX has supplied additional images, they can be found here:
https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/en5et7qf82czxloh9rhmf/h?rlkey=bnc26q8qeea9cz1po6pl7sg1t&dl=0
https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/ofqz1k6sf55p7lpy71c9w/h?rlkey=qugesvpw6wqgi1evauwigz5b2&dl=0

full_threads.body:

Hi @chris 

Here's what's been done
  • ✅ Page 1 - Update the main menu - Product Subheading items. Please only update titles, NOT URLs.
  • ✅ Page 2 - Update the following page layout according to the PDF - https://staging-duracube.kinsta.cloud/products/
  • ✅ Page 3 - Create a new page - https://staging-duracube.kinsta.cloud/partitioning-systems/

Note: I've added the Duracube logo as a temporary featured image. Please inform me when the client's images are ready so I can proceed with the update.


Remaining task (continue on monday)
  • Page 5 - Update the following page layout according to PDF https://duracube.com.au/product/3000-series-toilet-and-shower-partitions-pedestal-mounted-overhead-braced/


Time: +35mins
Hi @jaime, here is an updated PDF, the instructions remain unchanged except for Page 4 being removed.

action.text: Manuel Lito Manceli assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body: @chris @ricaR all good now and please proceed @jaime here is the link https://staging-duracube.kinsta.cloud/
@manuel please create a staging site for this. Once done please assign to @jaime for the remaining tasks.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia moved this conversation from the Unknown Mailbox inbox

full_threads.body:
Hi Rica,

Please see the attached file from Belinda at Duracube. Jaime is familiar with this site so it may be a good one for him once Manuel sets up the staging environment.

Reference "Page #" refers to the PDF page number.

Tasks:

1. Manuel to create a staging/test environment

2. Jaime to complete the updates as presented in the PDF

Page 1 - Update the main menu - Product Subheading items. Please only update titles, NOT URLs.

Page 2 - Update the following page layout according to the PDF https://duracube.com.au/products/

Page 3 - Create a new page https://duracube.com.au/partition-systems

This page will allow the use of new diagram and the new product titles (updated earlier)

Page 4 - Delete/disregard entirely.

Page 5 - Update the following page layout according to PDF https://duracube.com.au/product/3000-series-toilet-and-shower-partitions-pedestal-mounted-overhead-braced/

Please use blue for the DOWNLOAD DATA SHEET button, not green.

Thanks,


Chris Paradowski
Partnerships Manager

Hi Belinda, Hi Ben,

Great to meet today and talk all things Duracube.

Here is a quick recap.

Website rebuild

Heath and I will prepare a Website rebuild quote within 48 business hours of receiving the Duracube info. We kindly ask you to share all relevant information, including the proposed SEO/marketing scope as this will ensure the accuracy of your proposal.

Website updates

We will begin working on the Duracube website amendments. These will be completed in a staging environment using your website support hours. Once completed, we will present the updates for your review and approval prior to going live.

Thanks and speak soon,



Chris Paradowski
Partnerships Manager
